page.title: 20APPLETON ROEBUCK NAMES
page.content: Here are the names of the children who took part:Peter Allison,James Birkley, James Cooke,Richard Fila,Jo Fish,Sarah Fisher,Helen Flint,Damian Hirst,Laura Holden,Nicola & Caroline Hurrell, Martin Ibbotson,Emma Kowles,Philip Lonsdale,Iain Mcturk,Richard Musgrave, Danielle Newton,Michael Phillips, Claire Riley,Angela Sampson,Grant Skinner,Susan Spouse,Neil Taylor, Natalie Watson,Nicola Wharf,Rachel Ziegler. This is a sample of{surnames.}It is compiled from the current J2. {Stop press:}NYCC are proposing to close Bolton Percy school and send the children to Appleton. The parents are fighting to save their school. The weather has been cold of late with early snow threatened but it has been a dry autumn.This survey has been written by Anthony Still. 26/11/85
